content: hi bonnie what does bluethistle ai offer?

BlueThistle AI offers a range of AI-powered solutions including AI chatbots, automation services, and custom AI project implementations. Our services are designed to improve efficiency and enhance customer service by leveraging the latest in artificial intelligence technologies. Would you like more information on any specific service?
yeah what is the pricing for such service?

Here's a brief overview of our pricing structure:

- **Basic AI Package**: Setup Fee of £500, Monthly Retainer of £750 (optional).
- **Advanced AI Package**: Setup Fee of £750, Monthly Retainer of £1,200 (optional).
- **24/7 AI Support Package (Premium)**: Setup Fee of £1,000, Monthly Retainer of £1,500 (optional).

Would you like more details on a specific package?
yeah how can the 24/7 package benefit my carpet fitting busines

The 24/7 AI Support Package can significantly benefit your carpet fitting business by providing round-the-clock customer support. It ensures that customer inquiries, bookings, and service requests are handled efficiently outside of traditional business hours. This level of support can enhance customer satisfaction, streamline your booking process, and potentially increase sales by being accessible at all times. Would you like to explore how to implement this package for your business?
great how do i book a call?

You can book a call by visiting our consultation page at https://bluethistleai.co.uk/consultation/. This page will guide you through scheduling a call with one of our specialists to discuss your needs in detail.
